meanings.definition: Make false and defamatory statements about someone.
meanings.sent1: She was calumnying her classmate by spreading lies about her.
meanings.sent2: The politician was caught calumnying his opponent during the debate.
meanings.sent3: The gossiping parrot was calumnying the other birds in the aviary.
meanings.sent4: The internet trolls were calumnying the celebrity with fake news.
meanings.sent5: The villain in the movie was calumnying the hero to tarnish his reputation.

meanings.definition: Spread false and harmful statements about someone.
meanings.sent1: He was calumnying his coworker by spreading rumors about her work.
meanings.sent2: The tabloids were calumnying the actress with scandalous stories.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat was calumnying the dog by blaming it for the broken vase.
meanings.sent4: The rival company was calumnying our products to gain an advantage.
meanings.sent5: The bully was calumnying the new student to make them feel unwelcome.
